difficulty.desc: This can not be changed after the world was generated - Options: 0 - (normal), 1 - (expert), 2 - (master), 3 - (journey)

lang.desc: English=en-US, German=de-DE, Italian=it-IT, French=fr-FR, Spanish=es-ES, Russian=ru-RU, Chinese=zh-Hans, Portuguese=pt-BR, Polish=pl-PL

motd.desc: Set the message of the day

npcs.desc: Reduces enemy skipping but increases bandwidth usage. The lower the number the less skipping will happen, but more data is sent. 0 is off.

password.desc: Server Password - leave blank for none

port.desc: What port to bind the server to

seed.desc: This can not be changed after the world was generated - Seed of the World

size.desc: This can not be changed after the world was generated - World Size (1-3 - 3 is biggest)

version.display: Server Version (Set this to the latest server version) - It is the current terraria Version without the Points (Client Version: 1.4.3.2 -> Server Version: 1432)
